lead_paragraph: Mauricio Pochettino hailed an "almost perfect" performance on Saturday after his Tottenham Hotspur side thumped Stoke City 4-0 away, with Harry Kane scoring his first goal in 10 games for club and country.

headline.print_headline: Spurs Delight Pochettino as Kane Ends Barren Spell
headline.main: Spurs Delight Pochettino as Kane Ends Barren Spell

snippet: Mauricio Pochettino hailed an "almost perfect" performance on Saturday after his Tottenham Hotspur side thumped Stoke City 4-0 away, with Harry Kane scoring his first goal in 10 games for club and country....
